title: Maisy and panda
brief_description: Ten short animated stories about Maisy - a charming young female mouse and her friends, including Charley the crocodile, Eddie the elephant, and Cyril the squirrel. Each story has voiceover narration and a gently comic tone that endorses the virtues of friendship and sharing. “Panda”: Daisy takes Panda to the playground where they run into Cyril and his bouncing ball. “Torch”: Tallulah brings over her new torch and everyone has fun making shadow puppets. “Library”: Charlie and Maisy take a trip to the library to return some books. “Wheel”: Pushhorse has lost a wheel and Panda is in for a wobbly ride unless they can locate the missing wheel. “Puppets”: Cyril makes a visit and Maisy and her friends enjoy the puppet show he puts on. “Cleaning”: A hungry Charlie is getting in the way of Maisy’s cleaning. “Doctor”: Maisy’s playing dress ups and today she’s Doctor Maisy. First patient is an unwell Panda. Tallulah plays nurse. “Wheelbarrow”: Using her wheelbarrow and shovel, Maisy plants a new tree in the garden, Rabbit’s proving a hindrance. “Snail”: Charlie makes friends with a snail he discovers on the watering can. “Goodnight”: Tallulah sleeps over and she and Maisy make the necessary bedtime preparations. Vocal and sounds by the Umbilical Brothers. Narrated by Neil Morrisey. Created by Lucy Cousins.
